text:
Ga nyangka kan ada tempat nyaman di Cikarang.. yessss Java palace hotel.. awalnya ga sengaja cari nice place for staycation yang ga jauh dari Jakarta.. and ternyataaaa it was such a good choice saat pilihan jatuh ke Java palace Cikarang.. well as u know Cikarang ga jauh dr Jakarta, cukup lah sekedar buat lepas penat dr rutinitas harian.. 
Nice ambience, bersih, nyaman n feel aman di masa yg masih berurusan dengan yg namanya COVID.. protokol kesehatan mereka jalankan dr pertama kita masuk ke area hotel ke lobby proses check-in sampai di kamar
Cek ricek semua hal yg ada di kamar pun minus kekurangan, bersih
Staff nya ? Ramah n sangat membantu.. itulah juga yang bikin kita betah n for sure will return next mth even only for wikenan
Breakfast ? Ok ! Pertahankan ya rasa n variasi menu nya 🤍
Fasilitas ? Terpenuhi semua kebutuhan.. lobby nyaman, resto n lounge tuk ngopi ada.. and yg penting lagi ada pool tuk bocah bocah berenang, so aman lah for family gateway
Overall... Puas.. 
Thx ya JavaPalace for ur good hospitality !

text:
Like most places in Indonesia (and SEA for that matter), the people are lovely. They cannot do enough to help or please you. If not for the staff, I would have rated 1. However, 2 things let this hotel down for me:

1) English - whilst I was there (about 10 days), it soon became very apparent that most of the clients were related in some way or the other to the company that I work for and therefore all were English-speaking from Europe. The level of English, in my opinion, needs a lot of improvement;

2) Menu choices - This is applicable for dinner mainly (as breakfast, to be fair, was really good). The choices are very limited and quite poor from a healthy point of view. Cikarang is not really a place where you can eat out, so the hotel really could do with improving meal choices.

The pool, the spa facilities and the gym are good. I wasn't very impressed by the massage though...

WIFI is also very good throughout the hotel

If you are Muslim there is a place to pray (like most places in Indonesia) on the 2nd floor but I preferred to join the staff in the basement and pray in congregation :-)

I was not aware that the hotel allowed smoking indoors and although my room did not smell, the corridor wreaked of cigarette smell (for my liking!)
title: So much potential but very disappointing

text:
Good business location and facilities.  The large rooms are well appointed - good working desk, large comfortable bed and large flatscreen TV.  The hotel staff are very good throughout and very attentive.  The basement bar has a good pool table and bar menu - although the live music is so loud there is no chance for conversation!  Breakfast is good and the hotel provide airport pick-up/drop off and also a shuttle service to the local industrial parks.  The adjacent Korean restaurant is also very good.  
One tip - ask for a room on the back of the hotel - the sound insulation isn't great and traffic starts early
title: Recommended

text:
Third business trip to Cikarang in as many years. Previously heeded advice and stayed in Jakarta and commuted, however despite very nice hotel (Hotel Mulia) the 2-3 hour commute each way drains your soul, and means you only use it for meals and a bed. 
This time noticed Java Palace was a new local hotel with decent reviews so thought I would try it.
As regards the commute to the local industrial park (10 minutes!) an absolute dream, and the place is decent enough, picked a deluxe room which was much better than I expected. Nicely decorated with a large comfortable bed, Decent shower and bath. Excellent service form the staff and always someone on hand who speaks good English (sad to say my Indonesian isn't that good).
As reported by others windows only single glazed so you hear noise form outside, including on the second night the call to pray at 4.45am! However I was suffering jet lag and the next night deliberately stayed up to midnight and then slept straight through.
Restaurant is decent and considering the location offers you enough choice at breakfast and evening meal.
NOTE: Booked Silver Bird taxi from the airport to use Credit Card payment, still cheap only £30 for a Merc E class. However cc machine refused to work outside hotel! must have a bad signal. Hotel stepped in and paid driver in cash and added to bill +5% commission, saved me a huge problem at midnight as well !
Hotel also booked Silver bird for me to get back to airport, this time cc machine worked at airport.

All in all, very worth while saving the daily commute, nicely kitted out, and very helpful friendly staff.
title: Excellent for the location

text:
I was there for four nights. The hotel organized a shuttle, great. Checkin was very convenient and friendly staff. Additionaly, there was  a promo for a free beer in the bar.
Room was on six floor and although the traffic in the roundabout never stopps, it was silent enough for a good sleep. The room is equipped with an efficient AC. It only works with the power card, but after some minutes the room cimate was nice.
Windows from floor to ceiling, couch, desk, very good bed (my best sleep for a long time!), coffetea preparation, wardrobe, mini bar and a huge flat screen are availabe.
Also wifi, but that could be a little bit quicker....
Breaky is very well assorted, japanese coner with Miso, sushi, western corner with sausages, toast, jam, also eggs made to order and some hot dishes from asia - very delicious !
Of course, fresh fruit available, juices and pastries. Waiters are friendly and helpfull, but in peak time overloaded. Peak time seems to be 7-730, after that the breaky room is very calm and enjoyable.
The pool is outside on third floor with a nice sitting area around and equipped with a countercurrent system for long time swimming. Service can be improved by pool towels and one shower doesnt work.
The gym is light, spacey and the machines looked wel maintained. I couldnot find to activate the AC, but it works without also.
Bath is equipped with tub and shower that is my favorite, with junge head.
Amenities are available, as well as dressing gown and flips.
Checkout was also a great experience, efficient and with a nice and happy guy at the reception counter.
Shuttle transport back to the airport took approx. 4 hors, but that wasnt an issue of the hotel, instead, of the traffic of Jakarta.
The next time I wil try again to get there, good hotel, small mall nearby and very light rooms.
Other guests are from China, Europe, Japan and so forth as there is an industrial region very near to the hotel.
title: Great staff, great pool and wonderful gym

text:
the hotel certainly do not even have a hint of being a palace like property.its very modern design was however very pleasant and as cikarang is strictly a buisness area you are free of  the usual hordes of tourists at the reception or the  other outlets.
i like the layout of the rooms. large with  complete faclities to conduct your business and communication online. room service was examplary with a  menu which was fairly good. however the breakfast was a a limited buffet spread meant for the business traveller  to fill up and dash routine.
the nite life is a pub at the basement. live music is provided on alternate days. the live entertainment must be an after thought as the musicians  are being blocked by guests enjoying their pool!
the service staff are friendly but i cant say the same for the seniors!
would be returning to cikarang for another business visit but wwould like to try another property , just to measure the standards of the hospitality indutry in the area. or should i stay in places like senanyan and brave the traffic to commute daily to cikarang?

I stayed here for 1 month during Covid lockdown for business purposes. 
Despite the obstacles due to the pandemic the hotel was run very well. 
The food in the hotel restaurant was very tasty. 
The room service was very thorough and reliable. 

The laundry service was excellent: 
Every day, without any exception, the laundry came back at the same day. 
Never missing, never mixed up pieces. 
Always correct according to list - hanging or folded.
Very clean and fresh smell.

The pick-up car service provided by the hotel. to pick us up in the evening at our customers´factory was every day in time, never late. 

In the neighborhood everything except food and drug store was closed. However the small shopping mall nearby was very convenient for daily requirements. 10 min walk away. 
Gym and pool were closed due to pandemic. 

Ok - due to the lockdown the hotel was not very highly frequented but nevertheless I found it great and very helpful that there was always somebody reachable by phone for any kind of assistance  (Thank you, Ms. Intan)

Ms./Mrs. Mimin gave me a spark of an idea how to solve the problem. Continued to Mr. Prasetyo, that helped me throughout the problem solving and managed to contact Mr. Alex, who was though not in his working hour, was willing to help through phone assistance at late night.

First, thank you to the incredible staff of the Java Palace hotel that made me feel at home even when so far from it.

The hotel itself is good, it could use a face-lift but even that adds a bit to the charm. The location was great, very convenient to where I needed to be in Jakarta, but far enough outside the main bustle of the city to be peaceful. The staff do a superb job at keeping everything clean. 

For the amenities, I really appreciated the pool and athletic facilities being well kept. Breakfast was great, and the staff were gracious.

The staffs English was great, so don't worry about that! I'm particular, a friendly young woman named Intan made sure that my wants and needs were more than met. I look forward to seeing her again, next time I am here.

text:
This is a new hotel in Jababeka industrial area opened for maybe half a year. It is useful for people who need to visit factories nearby and do not want to be jam in Jakarta city jam. It seem to be a Korean owned hotel, but I didn't do any confirmation on this.
The check-in is "ok", as in there are people behind the counter but didn't offer to help, maybe still under training, but a "senior" staff turn up pretty quick enough after that to do my check-in and it didn't take long. And they offer a coupon for free beer as welcome drink instead of the usual orange juice, which is cool. 
The room is well appointed, with good size and usual hotel setting. The flooring is laminated. The bed is thick, high and posh, with nice pillows. It comes with 2 armchairs and a cushioned desk chair. The minibar is well stocked for those who need it. The toilet has 2 type of shower heads which is common with most new hotel now, and a glass partition on the room side.  This is better than the hotel nearby of a few years old as that has a cold ceramic floor and flat beds, with overly-minimalist (read bare) furnishings. Now come the not so good points. The room was warm when I entered (28 degree) and still 26 degree after almost an hour. I called the engineering staff and they said cannot do much and asked me to wait for 2 hours for it to cool down, and that was 4pm. I can't imagined if it is 1pm or so. The other not so good point is there is no power socket at the writing desk for ur laptop. The nearest one is quite a stretch for my ac adaptor, but that they solve pretty fast by loaning me an extension power socket. The wi-fi signal is decent for usual emailing purposes. Sleep quality was ok with the nice mattress and pillow. The down side is the air-conditioning, which now has the area under it too cold but the rest of the room just nice just "ok". The sound proofing was not desirable as I can hear guest next door coming back at midnight (but just for a night). The other thing which they didn't do anything was there was a consistent knocking sound outside the window, which I found to be a loose cable or rope or chain the next morning. I called front desk for assistance. Was informed someone will come to my room in 10-15 min, but didn't see anyone till I check out 2 days later. 
Though room was reasonably good, the same cannot be said for breakfast. It is even bad and disappointing. They did try to cover different taste, international to local, to Korean and Japanese, but the variety is very limited, maybe 2 choices each. The worst is the food quality and standard is low. Breakfast wise, the one down the road is better.    
The other incident is I requested for transport to airport. I was informed of one price but they change to another the next morning upon check-out as they say no more cheap car. They could have informed me earlier as a courtesy. They finally revert to old price after some discussion. But the problem is the car smell of smoke, which is not very nice as the journey is 2.5 hours.
As on most business trip, I didn't try much of the other facilities, though they have the usual gym, spa, swimming pool, pub with live band, pool table. For dinner, I usually go across the road to JB Plaza for local food at Solaria. There isn't much other food outlets but it is should do for 2-3 nights on business trip. Crossing the road is earlier here than the other hotel down the road.
So as summary, this new hotel has better room but not very nice breakfast compared to the other hotel down the room. So my advice is for those who can don't need to visit factories early to stay in Jakarta and join the jam instead.
title: Acceptable... with good and not so good points

text:
출장으로 왔는데 마음에 듭니다
프랑스 마르세유 출장때 이용했던 호텔보다 반 가격(물가 차이때문이겠지만)에 시설이랑 서비스는 훨씬 좋네요

장점 
1. 조식 석식 포함
2. 호텔에 한식 식당이 있어 점심도 고민없이 해결 가능하다
3. 직원들이 친절하고 영어는 물론이고 한국어 가능한 직원(sta)도 있다
4. 이동은 호텔에서 기사포함된 차량을 지원해 준다(무료)
    공항 픽업 및 드랍 포함
5. 호텔에 코로나 검사소가 있어 출국전 검사가 편하다

text:
입국 후 자가격리로 선택한 호텔.

1. 자카르타 시내에서 멀다고 다들 걱정이었지만 대한항공 입국 후 입국, 검역 심사 끝내고 호텔 도착하니 밤 10시. 공항에서 한 시간도 안 걸린 셈. 코로나 시국이라 교통체증이 없긴 했지만 생각처럼 먼 거리 아님.

보통 때 시내 호텔 도착 하는 시간과 큰 차이 없음.

그리고 어차피 격리라 나가지도 못하니 자카르타 시내와 가깝던지 멀던지 문제가 안됨.

1. 룸은 스위트. 혼자라 좀 크지 않을까 했는데 굿 초이스였음. 슈페리어,디럭스와 가격 차이도 크게 나지 않을 뿐더러 통유리로 들어오는 볓이 좋아 답답한 맘 하나 들지 않고 운동할 수 있는 공간도 나와서 좋았음.

2. 마음에 든 건 바닥이 카펫이 아니라 나무 바닥이라 먼지도 덜 나고 혼자 물 걸레로 치우기도 편함. 운동하고 땀이 많이 나서.

3. 음식 : 이 호텔로 정한 큰 이유.점심. 저녁 한식 선택 가능. 아침은 잘 안 먹었지만 일식, 아메리칸식 중 일식 고르면 밥이랑 국은 있으니 괜찮았음. 메뉴도 적당하고 맛있음.

참고로, 한식 레스토랑에서 룸 서비스로 삼겹살. 낚지볶음 등 추가 한식 주문 가능. ( 한국 프론트에 계신 분들 다시 한 번 감사드립니다.^^)

4. 단점: 에어컨이 너무 쎄요.ㅎ  저녁 전까지만 틀어놔도 밤에 잘 때는 끄고 자도 이불 덮고 자도 문제 없을 정도로 에어컨이 너무 셈. 에어컨 바람 맞으면 뒷통수가 시릴 정도임.

5. 굳이 한국 음식 바리바리 한국에서 싸올 필요도 없고 비싼 시내 호텔에서 서양식, 현지식 먹으면서 지내는 거 보다 훨씬 좋았다고 봄.

6. 가족들 입국하면 묵게 할 의향 100%임

7. 감사합니다. 잘 쉬다가 갑니다. ^^

찌까랑 근처에서 출장으로 숙박가능한 곳은 

한국인이 운영하는 게스트 하우스, 혹은 3성급 이상의 호텔이 있다.

한국인 게스트 하우스의 경우 한국인이 있어 소통도 편하고 한국인 스타일에 맞춰서 운영하지만,
 게스트 하우스인 만큼 전문적인 서비스나 시설은 부족한 편이다.

호텔의 경우 게스트 하우스보다 전문적인 서비스와 편의시설이 있기 때문에 생활이 훨씬 편하지만, 대부분 현지인과 영어, 인도네시아어(바하사) 등으로 소통해야 한다.

자바펠리스는 한국인이 운영하고 한국인 직원이 있는 4성급 호텔이다.

호텔 서비스도 4성급에 맞게 전문적으로 운영되면서, 상시 한국인 직원을 통해 연락할 수 있다.

현지인과의 의사소통 문제로 인한 답답함이나
시설, 서비스 등의 부재로 인한 불편함이 없다.

헬스장, 스파, 마사지, 수영장, 골프연습등을 할 수 있고

호텔 내부에 바, 레스토랑, 한식 레스토랑, 비지니스 클럽까지 있다.

호텔 정면에는 대형마켓과 번화가가 있어 간단한 외식도 할 수 있다.

업무를 위한 호텔 셔틀버스를 사용할 수 있다.

이는 당신이 출장을 와서 온전히 업무 외에 아무것도 신경쓰거나 스트레스 받을 필요가 없다는 뜻이다.

당연하지만 다음출장에도 이용할 것이고, 당신에게도 추천한다.

출장동안 지내면서 많은 도움을 주셨던 추동오 상무님, 벨라, 출퇴근에 도움을 준 판짜(Panca) 리셉션의 리잘 Rizal, 시큐리티, 하우스키핑 모든분들 감사합니다. 다음에 봐요

아 그리고 호텔 옆 고주몽 레스토랑에 육전하고 맥주 시켜 드시면 맛있습니다.
